<!-- Workspace-specific instructions for GitHub Copilot -->

## Project Overview
PyQt5/PyQtGraph GUI application for electrode visualization with grid-based selection interface.

## Environment Setup
- Conda environment: `electrode_mapper`
- Python 3.10
- Activate with: `conda activate electrode_mapper`

## Key Features
- 4x4 grid layout with 16x16 squares each
- Coordinate mapping between OpenEphys electrodes, Sparrow pixels, and grid coordinates
- Interactive selection with color-coded lists
- JSON configuration loading and saving
- Zoom functionality for individual grids
